department: Public Works and Government Services, PSPC
short_summary: Request for Proposal for Replacing current laser engraving equipment.
description: The Department of National Defense, Maintenance Company (Maint Coy) is a highly supportive unit required to provide second-line maintenance to Atlantic Canada, as well as first-line maintenance to most units in CFB Gagetoycu. In order to remain functional and support the various units, Maint Coy requires a new laser engraver, capable of completed a variety of complex tasks.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### LASER ENGRAVER

This procurement is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND).

#### **Description:**
The Department of National Defence's Maintenance Company requires a new laser engraver to perform complex tasks, including engraving weapon systems of varying sizes. The laser engraver must be capable of accurately processing and engraving equipment such as 9mm pistols to 81mm mortars.

#### **Procurement Details**

- **Solicitation Number:** WS4214922389
- **Publication Date:** September 19, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** October 19, 2023 at 14:00 (EST)
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** October 23, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date:** To be determined
- **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

#### **Trade Agreements**

This procurement is eligible under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

#### **Contact Information**

Leger, Lyne (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Please note the details may have changed as the tender has already expired.
